title: Ancient wonders captured in 3D
description: Ancient monuments give us clues to astonishing past civilizations -- but they're under threat from pollution, war, neglect. Ben Kacyra, who invented a groundbreaking 3D scanning system, is using his invention to scan and preserve the world's heritage in archival detail. (Watch to the end for a little demo.)
author: Ben Kacyra
keywords: TED, talks, history, invention, technology, archaeology
